mapper.select: select * from house_list a, wishlist c,(select * from house_picture where house_picture_num in (select max(house_picture_num) from house_picture group by house_num)) b where a.house_num = b.house_num and a.house_num = c.house_num and c.user_id= #{user_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM wishlist WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND house_num = #{house_num}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM wishlist_items WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND house_num = #{house_num}
